data.sentence: The word كَفَيْنَاكَ comes from the root ك ف ي and is associated with the meanings: To be enough, sufficient.

data.meanings: to bring down disgrace upon, send down contempt. To mock/ridicule/deride/laugh. (e.g. huzuwan, 2:67) .
data.sentence: The word الْمُسْتَهْزِءِينَ comes from the root ه ز ا and is associated with the meanings: to bring down disgrace upon, send down contempt. To mock/ridicule/deride/laugh. (e.g. huzuwan, 2:67) .
